names.english: resolve toxins and stop pain decoction
names.commonEnglish: Resolve Toxins and Stop Pain Decoction

actions: Drains Heat, relieves Fire toxicity and cools the Blood.
Invigorates the Blood, circulates Qi and stops pain.
Clears Heat, especially in the Upper Jiao and relieves toxicity.
With Ban Lan Gen, for any externally contracted Heat disorder.
Dispels Wind, disperses Wind-Heat, eliminates toxins and stops itching and pain.
Spreads Liver Qi, relieves Stagnation and disperses Wind-Heat.
With Huang Qin, restores the normal functioning of the Liver and Gallbladder.
With Bo He, for emotional depression, a stifling sensation in the chest and irregular menstruation due to Liver Blood Stagnation and Deficiency.
With Gan Cao, for hepatitis and upper right quadrant pain.
Spreads and regulates Liver Qi and alleviates pain.
With Chai Hu, for Qi Stagnation and menstrual irregularity.
With Yan Hu Suo, treats everything from Liver Qi Stagnation to Deep Blood Stasis with pain anywhere in the body.
Dredges Liver Qi, releases Stagnation, stops pain and conducts Heat out from below.
With Yan Hu Suo, for intermittent epigastric and hypochondriac pain, hernia pain or menstrual pain with irritability due to Liver Stagnation with Heat.
With Yan Hu Suo and Xiang Fu, for hypochondriac and abdominal pain.
Disperses Wind-Heat, vents rashes and relieves Stagnation of Liver Qi.
Regulates Qi, adjusts the Middle, relieves the diaphragm and dries Dampness.
Clears Heat and relieves Fire toxicity.
Clears Heat, dries Dampness, drains Fire, detoxifies and calms ascending Liver Yang.
With Chai Hu, for Heat in the Shao Yang with alternating chills and fever and nausea.
Dredges Liver Qi
Releases Stagnation
Clears Heat
Resolves toxicity
Stops pain
syndromes: Emotional (Liver Qi) Stagnation leading to Toxic Heat

symptoms: Hypochondriac and Stomach fullness and pain
